MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the KY6 postcode area of Glenrothes. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 6:30pm due to damaged electrical equipment on Kenilworth Drive and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 8:30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6:10pm on Saturday, 24 April 2021
